name: Trapaganza (Demo)
description:
Trapaganza is a collaborative project developed for a University project.

It aims to combine the past with the future and as the player, you have to overcome various challenges and puzzles in order to reach the end. 

This is a Demo of the full game and so there will be improvements made before the full game is released. 

Credits:

  • Jonathan Cohen
  • Morgan Brown
  • Richard Koys
